title: [중경이공대-카이스트 교육협력센터]FACULTY RECRUITING
content: Faculty positions in the areas of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science are available immediately at Liangjiang International College (LIC) in Chongqing University of Technology (CQUT), China, which was established in collaboration with Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), Korea. Research is in the areas of Intelligent Robotics, Transportations, Wireless Communications and Artificial Intelligence and Big Data. A fairly attractive remuneration package, good research facility and initial research funding will be provided. LIC of Chongqing University of Technology is a Sino-Korean joint education program officially approved by Chinese Ministry of Education (MOE) between Chongqing University of Technology and Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST). LIC provides international education at 4-year undergraduate level and 3-year graduate level in the areas of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. CQUT-KAIST Joint Research Institute funded by Chongqing Science and Technology Commission will provide excellent research environment for faculties. 1-year research opportunity jointly with KAIST professors will be provided at KAIST, Korea. The prospective candidate is expected to teach courses for both undergraduate/graduate levels and conduct research on Intelligent Systems. Qualification: - A long-term career goal in academia - A PhD degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or Operations Research, or Applied Math - Strong publication record in top-tier conferences and journals - Excellent English proficiency Interested applicants can email your CV and key publications to Ms. Du Xiaojing through email ( hjdu＠kaist.ac.kr ) for further processing. Review of applications will continue until the position is filled. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted via email.
